body:
Greg,
Thank you for the reply. We figured this might be a tricky rendering to pull
off, luckily we don't absolutely need it at this point. We have the
equipment and the blind to put together a BTDF file, but not the time or
budget. If you come up with a tool that would allow us to model this please
keep us in mind.
Thanks a ton for all of the hard work you put into this software.
Nick
